mapper.insert: insert all into time values( #{cont_kind},#{cont_no},'s',TO_DATE(#{time_start_date},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') ) into time values( #{cont_kind},#{cont_no},'e',TO_DATE(#{time_end_date},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') ) select * from dual
mapper.select: select mm.mem_name, pt.mem_no from member mm,participants pt where 1=1 and pt.mem_no=mm.mem_no and pt.cont_kind='schd' and pt.cont_no=#{shcd_no}

select sh.schd_no, tl.tim_cont, (select ti.time_date from time ti where ti.cont_kind='schd' and ti.cont_no=sh.schd_no and ti.time_kind='s')as time_start_date, (select ti.time_date from time ti where ti.cont_kind='schd' and ti.cont_no=sh.schd_no and ti.time_kind='e')as time_end_date, sh.schd_loc, sh.schd_memo, (select mem_name from member where mem_no=#{mem_no})as mem_nick, tl.pro_no from timeline tl,schedule sh where 1=1 and tl.cont_kind='schd' and tl.cont_no=sh.schd_no and tl.mem_no=#{mem_no}

select sh.schd_no, tl.tim_cont, (select ti.time_date from time ti where ti.cont_kind='schd' and ti.cont_no=sh.schd_no and ti.time_kind='s')as time_start_date, (select ti.time_date from time ti where ti.cont_kind='schd' and ti.cont_no=sh.schd_no and ti.time_kind='e')as time_end_date, sh.schd_loc, sh.schd_memo, (select mem_name from member where mem_no=#{mem_no})as mem_nick, tl.pro_no from timeline tl,schedule sh,participants pp where 1=1 and tl.cont_kind='schd' and pp.cont_kind=tl.cont_kind and pp.cont_no=sh.schd_no and tl.cont_no=sh.schd_no and pp.mem_no=#{mem_no}

select (select ti.time_date from time ti where ti.cont_kind='schd' and ti.cont_no=sh.schd_no and ti.time_kind='s')as time_start_date, (select ti.time_date from time ti where ti.cont_kind='schd' and ti.cont_no=sh.schd_no and ti.time_kind='e')as time_end_date, tl.tim_cont, sh.schd_no, sh.schd_loc, sh.schd_memo from timeline tl,schedule sh where 1=1 and tl.cont_kind='schd' and tl.cont_no=sh.schd_no and sh.schd_no=#{schd_no}
mapper.update: update time set time_date = TO_DATE(#{start},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') where cont_kind='schd' and time_kind='s' and cont_no=#{cont_no}
update time set time_date=TO_DATE(#{end},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') where cont_kind='schd' and time_kind='e' and cont_no=#{cont_no}
